title: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams to Amazon API Gateway via Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose
description: POST data received by Kinesis Data Streams to an HTTP endpoint securely using Kinesis Data Firehose

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to send data received by Kinesis Data Streams to an HTTP endpoint with authorization (here API Gateway REST API) using Kinesis Data Firehose.
